text: 'Majestic' mountain lion captured after hourslong SF standoff - SFGATE
fullText: San Francisco Zoo personnel were seen pulling out tranquilizer darts and a rifle. The mountain lion spotted in Lafayette Park on Monday has now been moved.

text: Carney rolls his eyes at US Treasury secretary, says he told Trump he meant what he said at Davos - AP News

text: Mike McCarthy will call offensive plays for the Steelers - NBC Sports
fullText: Since the days of quarterbacks calling their own plays (yes, it used to be that way), the Steelers have never had a head coach who called the offensive plays.

text: A federal judge has blocked the possible deportation of a 5-year-old and his father for now - CNN
fullText: A Minnesota preschooler detained in Texas with his father cannot be imminently deported, a federal judge ruled Monday.

text: One person in critical condition after being shot in incident involving Border Patrol in Arizona - NBC News

text: When Tesla reports earnings, this could be the biggest highlight - MarketWatch
South Carolina measles outbreak is largest in US since measles was declared eliminated - CNN
fullText: The fast-growing measles outbreak in South Carolina is now the largest in the United States since the disease was declared eliminated in this country more than two decades ago.

text: Scientists shed new light on the brain’s role in heart attack - NPR
fullText: Researchers discovered a feedback loop between nerve cells, the immune system and the heart. They think it shows promise as a target for future therapies.

text: Brian Daboll to become Titans OC for fellow ex-NY coach Robert Saleh — on one condition - New York Post

text: Why There's Simply No Need For An iPad Anymore - bgr.com
